description: This simple risoni is packed with spring vegetables and fresh flavours.
name: Spring Vegetable Risoni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: After about 10 minutes, remove from the heat and stir in half of the parmesan and lemon zest. Cover and cook for 3 more minutes. Serve with lemon wedges and the rest of the parmesan on top.
